content: claim as your own i would love to see pictures of your beautiful beanies you can tag me on instagram @katey knits and share your pic with the hashtag #thephoenixbeanie so i can see your work © 2020katey knits all rights reserved it is illegal to redistribute sell or share the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically page 4 backwards loop cast on increase 1 2 3 hold working yarn as shown in continue through to make a new pull to tighten picture stitch on right needle with right needle go around the yarn in front… tutorial pictures provided are from kristentendyke com page 5 i do not claim these images as my own
